content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column video_bg=”yes” video_bg_url=””][vc_column_text]

Put on your rose-coloured glasses for a brighter view of the world and support a humanitarian cause! Take your friends to the Esplanade 1925 Bar for Pink Afternoon Tea and indulge in the sweetest pink moments.

 

In the month for the fight against breast cancer, we invite you to use your posts on Instagram and influence on social media to help raise awareness and encourage others to get an early screening, and we will donate 10% of the proceeds of PINK Afternoon Tea to the non-profit association PINK life.

 

In doing so, you can win an amazing weekend for two at the Esplanade Hotel!
How to participate in the PINK GIVEAWAY?
• come to the Esplanade 1925 Bar and order a limited-edition PINK Afternoon Tea for two
• raise a toast with your favourite pink drink
• wear pink
• take a selfie
• add hashtags #EsplanadePinkAfternoonTea #PinkOctober #PinkLife
• publish your post on Instagram and tag @esplanadezagreb

 

The prize for the lucky winner is valid for two people and includes:
• Weekend overnight stay in a luxurious Deluxe room
• Breakfast at Zinfandel’s Restaurant
• Cocktail and snack at the Esplanade 1925 Bar
Follow us for more info on Instagram!
Giveaway Rules

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_separator][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
